refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: C interface function which checks if two parameters send to the C function have the same size. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function. If the test fails, we return from the C interface and an adequate error message is printed in the Scilab console.
WARNING: This API is deprecated from Scilab 5.2.0 and is going to be removed with Scilab 6.0. Please use API Scilab (the new Scilab API).

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C interface function takes one input parameters and prints the integer corresponding to the type of the variable sent as parameter in the Scilab console.
